author: Thomas L
title: Amazing Hotel... with incredible staff! Highly recommended.
text:
I have only great things to say about our stay at this hotel. We were there for 9 nights in early February. Staying in the Residence Club is highly recommended. The staff there was SO hospitable, making us feel at home. Plus they have a great breakfast which is included with your room.
I travel a ton and stay in a lot of nice hotels. This has been one of the best experiences I have had in a while. Enough for me to write this review.
A special thanks again to all of the incredible hosts in the Residence Club. Sally, Vera, Cornelia, Steven, Betty, Chris, Leona and Hannah... You made our stay!
Room Tip: Residence Club is worth the extra money... for sure See more room tips
